instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message:
i got a macbook pro 13 inch with touch bar <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2017.

it  stopped after liquid damged
 J4402 and J3300 was a liquid
J4402  burned and i removed the connector and cleaned motherboard .
Now i am using JB500 to connect charger and the motherboard turns on but no display and  no caps lock react.
I dont know if the Spi can be corrupted or not.
Cpu heat but not enough

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message:
Only one USB port can power on the machine?
Do you get CPU core voltage?
